title: Fighting ISIS: The View From The Middle East
teaser: How is the Middle East reacting to news that the U.S. may begin another military action in the region?
contentencoded:
How is the Middle East reacting to news that the U.S. may begin another military action in the region?

Thanassis Cambanis, a veteran Middle East watcher, joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss the view from the Middle East.

Guest

  • Thanassis Cambanis, journalist and a fellow at The Century Foundation. He tweets @tcambanis.
